feed.title: kMITRA e-Magazine
feed.subtitle: The official e-magazine for Keshav Memorial Institute of Technology

entry.title: Minutes of the meeting
entry.content:
1. Introduction of new first year recruits.
  2. Discussion of new article topics for April edition.
  3. Assignment of mentors to mentees and mentees to mentors.
  4. Articles deadline submission: 3rd April.
  5. Editorial revamped.
  6. Prominent changes to site.
entry.summary: Introduction of new first year recruits. Discussion of new article topics for April edition. Assignment of mentors to mentees and mentees to mentors. Articles deadline submission: 3rd April. Editorial revamped. Prominent changes to site.

entry.title: Minutes of the meeting
entry.content:
1. No particular theme for the edition
  2. One of the articles/topics covers ‘The quirky habits of students during exam’
  3. Cover
    • Suits
    • Silicon Valley
    • Marvels Jessica Jones
  4. Collaborating and suspense article while interviewing students
entry.summary: No particular theme for the edition One of the articles/topics covers ‘The quirky habits of students during exam’ Cover Suits Silicon Valley Marvels Jessica Jones Collaborating and suspense article while interviewing students

entry.title: Minutes of the meeting
entry.content:
1. March edition retrospectin and inculcation of uncovered topics
  2. Oscar’s edition
  3. kMITRA is covering the Oscars, Grammys and KMIT Evening. We have 2 political/social op-eds
  4. Oscars: We are going to review all BEST PICTURE nominated movies and make a case for why it should win at the Oscars. We will also cover other categories like Best Animation, Best Foreign Film etc which will be an overview of that category.
  5. Grammys: We are going to cover the Grammys as well
  6. KMIT Evening We will be covering eve within two articles
    • Behind the scenes
    • Main event
  7. Op-eds
    • Politicization of awards
    • Triple Talaq
entry.summary: March edition retrospectin and inculcation of uncovered topics Oscar’s edition kMITRA is covering the Oscars, Grammys and KMIT Evening. We have 2 political/social op-eds Oscars: We are going to review all BEST PICTURE nominated movies and make a case for why it should win at the Oscars. We will also cover other categories like Best Animation, Best Foreign Film etc which will be an overview of that category. Grammys: We are going to cover the Grammys as well KMIT Evening We will be covering eve within two articles Behind the scenes Main event Op-eds Politicization of awards Triple Talaq
